txt.en: 'We are ready for the market. All three blends are of exceptional taste and flavour, and we have enough to last at least the first day, presuming we don't smoke it all ourselves first!\n\n'Go to the market-grounds and let Albin Northcotton know the pipe-weed for the market is ready.'
'The sweet smell of fresh pipe-weed is almost as nice as the smell of fresh-baked pie... almost.'
Pipe-weed is something hobbits take very seriously. A market would never be visited unless it had a suitable supply and variety.
Albin Northcotton is at the market-grounds at the Northcotton Farm.\n\nAlbin Northcotton will be pleased to hear the pipe-weed is ready.
